nodes.text: Chaos at the Castle is a young readers book in the World of Reading series that adapts scenes from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The book, a level one title, was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on August 2, 2016. The book is comprised of 32 pages and is intended for children ages six through eight.

This level one early reader retells a favorite scene from Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Featuring beautiful stylized illustrations, this World of Reading book is perfect for young fans ready to read on their own.
